item.title: How-To: Center anything with Flexbox
item.description: While learning Flexbox something I had quite some problem trying to figure out how to center an element on a page with CSS and Flexbox. it’s not that difficult: but sometimes you don’t see the easy solution when it’s right in front of you. #element{ display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; If you found this post helpful in anyway or if you have any questions: Don’t hesitate to reatch out to me on Twitter @BrobackDaniel
